overview: Gorgeous and sinful Stoya slips under the spell of lust, captivated by her new roommate, and hungry for passionate encounters. Mick Blue plays a naughty game of chasing tail, toying with romantic pursuits and hot sex with wet and wild chicks. Stoya dives in, feeding right into his lap, playing him for all his well endowed worth, until they come together and even the score.
tagline: Once she logs on, you'll never want to log off.
title: Web Whore
